trans-unit.source: Displays featured products in the central column of your homepage.
trans-unit.target: 显示在您的主页中央的特色商品。

trans-unit.source: The number of products is invalid. Please enter a positive number.
trans-unit.target: 商品数量无效。请输入一个正整数。

trans-unit.source: The category ID is invalid. Please choose an existing category ID.
trans-unit.target: 该分类ID 无效。请选择已有的分类ID。

trans-unit.source: To add products to your homepage, simply add them to the corresponding product category (default: "Home").
trans-unit.target: 要添加商品到你的主页面，只要把他们添加到相应的产品分类中就可以了（默认：”主页面“）。

trans-unit.source: Number of products to be displayed
Set the number of products that you would like to display on homepage (default: 8).
trans-unit.target: 设置你需要在首页上展示的产品数量（默认：8个）。

trans-unit.source: Category from which to pick products to be displayed
Choose the category ID of the products that you would like to display on homepage (default: 2 for "Home").
trans-unit.target: 选择你要在主页面中展示的产品分类ID（默认：在首页上2个）

trans-unit.source: Enable if you wish the products to be displayed randomly (default: no).
trans-unit.target: 如果你要产品随机展示请启用（默认为"禁用"）。
